http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-29679 - Editing text user experience is inconsistent
Added a new parameter to the positioning logic. Now we have a mode where we don't try to position the entire element in the viewable area. We use this mode if the softkeyboard is already open.

Small change to prevent throw velocity precision loss.

The runtime globalToLocal and localToGlobal coordinate-space conversion functions round all results to the nearest 0.05.  So now we scale our throw velocity values up and back to preserve more precision.
